title: The Battle of Antietam
itunes:title: The Battle of Antietam
description: They're back, Ladies and Gentleman!! Avery, Tony & Codie return after their brief hiatus and hit the ground running with the Battle of Antietam, otherwise known as the single bloodiest day in American military history. The gents talks about command decisions on both sides and shed more light on the pivotal Maryland Campaign of 1862, while also giving their perspectives on the battle via hilarious banter. Enjoy!
content:encoded: They're back, Ladies and Gentleman!!
